enableCaching.description: Determines if the "cache-control" HTTP headers should be set and if conditional GET (304) requests should be supported. This could be helpful to disable while in development mode.

enableTagHelperBundling.description: Determines if `<script>` and `<link>` elements should point to the bundled path or a reference per source file should be created. This is helpful to disable when in development mode.

url.description: An absolute URL used as a prefix for static resources

prefetch.description: If true, injects a <link rel='dns-prefetch'> tag that speeds up DNS resolution to the CDN.

cacheId.description: The cache identifier of the service worker (can be any string). Change this property to force the service worker to reload in browsers.

offlineRoute.description: The route to the page to show when offline.

registerServiceWorker.description: Determines if a script that registers the service worker should be injected into the bottom of the HTML page.

registerWebmanifest.description: Determines if a meta tag that points to the web manifest should be inserted at the end of the head element.

routesToPreCache.description: A comma separated list of routes to pre-cache when service worker installs in the browser.

strategy.description: Selects one of the predefined service worker types.

ApiKey.description: An elmah.io API key with the Messages | Write permission.

LogId.description: The Id of the elmah.io log to store messages in.

Application.description: An application name to put on all error messages.

HandledStatusCodesToLog.description: A list of HTTP status codes (besides 404) to log even though no exception is thrown.

TreatLoggingAsBreadcrumbs.description: Include log messages from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging as breadcrumbs.

HeartbeatId.description: The Id of the elmah.io heartbeat to notify.

protocols.description: The protocols enabled on the endpoint.

Path.description: The certificate file path. If a file path is specified then the certificate will be loaded from the file system.

KeyPath.description: The certificate key file path. Available in .NET 5 and later.

Password.description: The certificate password used to access the private key.

Subject.description: The certificate subject. If a subject is specified then the certificate will be loaded from the certificate store.

Store.description: The certificate store name. Defaults to 'My'.

Location.description: The certificate store location. Defaults to 'CurrentUser'.

AllowInvalid.description: A value indicating whether or not to load certificates that are considered invalid. Defaults to false.

sslProtocols.description: Specifies allowable SSL protocols. Defaults to 'None' which allows the operating system to choose the best protocol to use, and to block protocols that are not secure. Unless your app has a specific reason not to, you should use this default. Available in .NET 5 and later.

clientCertificateMode.description: Specifies the client certificate requirements for a HTTPS connection. Defaults to 'NoCertificate'. Available in .NET 5 and later.

Endpoints.description: Endpoints that Kestrel listens to for network requests. Each endpoint has a name specified by its JSON property name.

Url.description: The scheme, host name, and port the endpoint will listen on. A Url is required.

Sni.description: Server Name Indication (SNI) configuration. This enables the mapping of client requested host names to certificates and other TLS settings. Wildcard names prefixed with '*.', as well as a top level '*' are supported. Available in .NET 5 and later.

EndpointDefaults.description: Default configuration applied to all endpoints. Named endpoint specific configuration overrides defaults.

Certificates.description: Certificates that Kestrel uses with HTTPS endpoints. Each certificate has a name specified by its JSON property name. The 'Default' certificate is used by HTTPS endpoints that haven't specified a certificate.

logLevel.description: Log level configurations used when creating logs. Only logs that exceeds its matching log level will be enabled. Each log level configuration has a category specified by its JSON property name. For more information about configuring log levels, see https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/core/fundamentals/logging/#configure-logging.

FormatterName.description: Name of the log message formatter to use. Defaults to 'simple'.

FormatterOptions.description: Log message formatter options. Additional properties are available on the options depending on the configured formatter. The formatter is specified by FormatterName.

IncludeScopes.description: Include scopes when true. Defaults to false.

TimestampFormat.description: Format string used to format timestamp in logging messages. Defaults to null.

UseUtcTimestamp.description: Indication whether or not UTC timezone should be used to for timestamps in logging messages. Defaults to false.

LogToStandardErrorThreshold.description: The minimum level of messages are written to Console.Error.

additionalProperties.description: Logging configuration for a provider. The provider name must match the configuration's JSON property property name.

allowedHosts.description: ASP.NET Core host filtering middleware configuration. Allowed hosts is a semicolon-delimited list of host names without port numbers. Requests without a matching host name will be refused. Host names may be prefixed with a '*.' wildcard, or use '*' to allow all hosts.

connectionStrings.description: Connection string configuration. Get connection strings with the IConfiguration.GetConnectionString(string) extension method.

additionalProperties.description: Connection string configuration. Each connection string has a name specified by its JSON property name.

autoReload.description: Automatically reload the NLog configuration when notified that appsettings.json file has changed.

throwConfigExceptions.description: Throws an exception when there is a config error? If not set, then throwExceptions will be used for this setting.

throwExceptions.description: Throws an exception when there is an error. For unit testing only and advanced troubleshooting.

internalLogLevel.description: The minimal log level for the internal logger.

internalLogFile.description: Write internal log to the specified filepath

internalLogToConsole.description: Write internal log to a console

internalLogToConsoleError.description: Write internal log to a console with error stream

globalThreshold.description: Log events below this threshold are not logged.

autoShutdown.description: Automatically call `LogFactory.Shutdown` on AppDomain.Unload or AppDomain.ProcessExit

extensions.description: Load NLog extension packages for additional targets and layouts

assembly.description: Assembly Name of the NLog extension package.

prefix.description: Appends prefix to all type-names loaded from the assembly

assemblyFile.description: Absolute filepath to the Assembly-file of the NLog extension package.

async.description: Wrap all defined targets using AsyncWrapper with OverflowAction=Discard for better performance.

NLogRulesItem.description: Redirect LogEvents from matching Logger objects to specified targets

logger.description: Match Logger objects based on their Logger-name. Can use wildcard characters ('*' or '?').

ruleName.description: Rule identifier to allow rule lookup with Configuration.FindRuleByName and Configuration.RemoveRuleByName.

levels.description: Comma separated list of levels that this rule matches.

writeTo.description: Name or names of a target - separated by comma. Remove this property for sending events to the blackhole.

final.description: Ignore further rules if this one matches.

action.description: Result action when filter matches logevent.

filterDefaultAction.description: Default action if none of the filters match.

umbraco.description: Configuration of Open Source .NET CMS - Umbraco

Disabled.description: Indicating whether the exception filter is disabled

MaxLogAge.description: Maximum age of a log file - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings

BrowsableFileExtensions.description: Allowed file extensions (including the period .) that should be accessible from the browser

MaxQueryStringLength.description: Value for the maximum query string length

MaxRequestLength.description: Value for the maximum request length

EnableTours.description: Indicating whether back-office tours are enabled

AssembliesAcceptingLoadExceptions.description: A CSV string of assemblies that accept load exceptions during type finder operations

umbracoActiveDirectory.description: Configuration of Active Directory for Umbraco CMS

AllowedUploadFiles.description: Collection of file extensions without . that are allowed for upload

DisallowedUploadFiles.description: Collection of file extensions without . that are disallowed for upload

AutoFillImageProperties.description: Imaging autofill following media file upload fields

ImageFileTypes.description: Collection of accepted image file extensions

LoginBackgroundImage.description: Path to the login screen background image

LoginLogoImage.description: Path to the login screen logo image

DisableHtmlEmail.description: Whether HTML email notifications should be disabled

ResolveUrlsFromTextString.description: URLs should be resolved from text strings

ShowDeprecatedPropertyEditors.description: Deprecated property editors should be shown

ContentXPath.description: An XPath query for the content

allOf.description: Typed configuration for a content error page.

ContentId.description: Gets or sets a value for the content Id.

ContentKey.description: Gets or sets a value for the content key.

ContentXPath.description: Gets or sets a value for the content XPath.

HasContentId.description: Gets a value indicating whether the ContentId field is populated.

HasContentKey.description: Gets a value indicating whether the ContentKey field is populated.

HasContentXPath.description: Gets a value indicating whether the ContentXPath field is populated.

Culture.description: Gets or sets a value for the content culture.

LogIncompletedScopes.description: Indicating whether incompleted scopes should be logged

DumpOnTimeoutThreadAbort.description: Indicating whether memory dumps on thread abort should be taken

ReservedUrls.description: CSV string of reserved URLs (must end with a comma)

ReservedPaths.description: CSV string of reserved paths (must end with a comma)

DefaultUILanguage.description: Default UI language of Umbraco backoffice

HideTopLevelNodeFromPath.description: Indicating whether to hide the top level node from the path

UseHttps.description: Indicating whether HTTPS should be used

VersionCheckPeriod.description: Check for new version. Period in days

IconsPath.description: Path to Umbraco Icons for backoffice

UmbracoCssPath.description: Path to store CSS files used for website built with Umbraco

InstallMissingDatabase.description: Indicating whether to install the database when it is missing

DisableElectionForSingleServer.description: Indicating whether to disable the election for a single server

NoNodesViewPath.description: Path to view when the website built with Umbraco has no content nodes

WaitTimeBetweenCalls.description: The amount of time to wait between calls to the database on the background thread https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings

StaleServerTimeout.description: The time span to wait before considering a server stale, after it has last been accessed https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings

MaxProcessingInstructionCount.description: The maximum number of instructions that can be processed at startup; otherwise the server cold-boots (rebuilds its caches)

TimeToRetainInstructions.description: The time to keep instructions in the database. Records older than this number will be pruned https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings

TimeBetweenSyncOperations.description: The time to wait between each sync operations https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings

TimeBetweenPruneOperations.description: The time to wait between each prune operations https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings

From.description: Email address to use for messages

SecureSocketOptions.description: Secure socket options for SMTP server

Enabled.description: Indicating whether health check notifications are enabled

FirstRunTime.description: The first run time of a healthcheck notification in crontab format

Period.description: The period of the healthcheck notifications are run https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings

NotificationMethods.description: A collection of health check notification methods that are set by their alias such as 'email'

Enabled.description: Indicating whether the health check notification method is enabled

Verbosity.description: The health check notifications reporting verbosity

FailureOnly.description: Indicating whether the health check notifications should occur on failures only

Settings.description: An object of Health Check Notification provider specific settings. For the email notification it uses a setting 'RecipientEmail'

Debug.description: Indicating whether umbraco is running in [debug mode]

MaxWidth.description: Value for the maximim resize width

MaxHeight.description: Value for the maximim resize height

DisableKeepAliveTask.description: Indicating whether the keep alive task is disabled

KeepAlivePingUrl.description: Keep alive ping URL. {umbracoApplicationUrl} is replaced

Commands.description: Commands to add to the TinyMCE Richtext editor

Plugins.description: An array of TinyMCE Plugins to load such as 'paste', 'table'

CustomConfig.description: Custom configuration for TinyMCE and its plugins

ValidElements.description: A CSV string of valid HTML elements in the richtext editor. Ex: iframe[*],button[class|title]

InvalidElements.description: A CSV string of invalid HTML elements in the richtext editor. Ex: font

Name.description: Friendly name of Richtext Editor Command

Alias.description: Alias of the Richtext Editor Command

Mode.description: Set how the Richtext Editor Command can be used. Such as when a selction is made

AddTrailingSlash.description: Indicating whether to add a trailing slash to URLs

ConvertUrlsToAscii.description: Indicating whether to convert URLs to ASCII (valid values: true, try or false)

AllowPasswordReset.description: Indicating whether to allow user password reset

HideDisabledUsersInBackOffice.description: Indicating whether to hide disabled users in the back-office

KeepUserLoggedIn.description: Indicating whether to keep the user logged in

UsernameIsEmail.description: Indicating whether the user's email address is to be considered as their username

TryMatchingEndpointsForAllPages.description: Indicating whether to check if any routed endpoints match a front-end request before the Umbraco dynamic router tries to map the request to an Umbraco content item

TrySkipIisCustomErrors.description: Indicating whether IIS custom errors should be skipped

InternalRedirectPreservesTemplate.description: Indicating whether an internal redirect should preserve the template

DisableAlternativeTemplates.description: Indicating whether the use of alternative templates are disabled

ValidateAlternativeTemplates.description: Indicating whether the use of alternative templates should be validated

DisableFindContentByIdPath.description: Indicating whether find content ID by path is disabled

DisableRedirectUrlTracking.description: Indicating whether redirect URL tracking is disabled

InstallUnattended.description: Indicating whether unattended installs are enabled

UpgradeUnattended.description: Indicating whether unattended upgrades are enabled

UnattendedUserName.description: Use for creating a user with a name for Unattended Installs

UnattendedUserEmail.description: Use for creating a user with an email for Unattended Installs

UnattendedUserPassword.description: Use for creating a user with a password for Unattended Installs

ModelsNamespace.description: Namespace to use when generating strongly typed models

DebugLevel.description: Indicates the debug level. For internal / development use. Set to greater than zero to enable detailed logging.

AcceptUnsafeModelsDirectory.description: Indicates that the directory indicated in ModelsDirectory is allowed to be outside the website root (e.g. ~/../../some/place). Because that can be a potential security risk, it is not allowed by default.

FlagOutOfDateModels.description: Indicates whether out-of-date models (i.e. after a content type or data type has been modified) should be flagged.

umbracoUmbracoDefinition.description: Configuration of Umbraco CMS and packages

umbracoActiveDirectorySettings.description: Typed configuration options for active directory settings.

Domain.description: Gets or sets a value for the Active Directory domain.

umbracoContentSettings.description: Typed configuration options for content settings.

Notifications.description: Gets or sets a value for the content notification settings.

Imaging.description: Gets or sets a value for the content imaging settings.

ResolveUrlsFromTextString.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether URLs should be resolved from text strings.

Error404Collection.description: Gets or sets a value for the collection of error pages.

PreviewBadge.description: Gets or sets a value for the preview badge mark-up.

MacroErrors.description: Gets or sets a value for the macro error behaviour.

DisallowedUploadFiles.description: Gets or sets a value for the collection of file extensions that are disallowed for upload.

AllowedUploadFiles.description: Gets or sets a value for the collection of file extensions that are allowed for upload.

ShowDeprecatedPropertyEditors.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether deprecated property editors should be shown.

LoginBackgroundImage.description: Gets or sets a value for the path to the login screen background image.

LoginLogoImage.description: Gets or sets a value for the path to the login screen logo image.

umbracoContentNotificationSettings.description: Typed configuration options for content notification settings.

Email.description: Gets or sets a value for the email address for notifications.

DisableHtmlEmail.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether HTML email notifications should be disabled.

umbracoContentImagingSettings.description: Typed configuration options for content imaging settings.

ImageFileTypes.description: Gets or sets a value for the collection of accepted image file extensions.

AutoFillImageProperties.description: Gets or sets a value for the imaging autofill following media file upload fields.

allOf.description: Typed configuration options for image autofill upload settings.

Alias.description: Gets or sets a value for the alias of the image upload property.

WidthFieldAlias.description: Gets or sets a value for the width field alias of the image upload property.

HeightFieldAlias.description: Gets or sets a value for the height field alias of the image upload property.

LengthFieldAlias.description: Gets or sets a value for the length field alias of the image upload property.

ExtensionFieldAlias.description: Gets or sets a value for the extension field alias of the image upload property.

umbracoValidatableEntryBase.description: Provides a base class for configuration models that can be validated based on data annotations.

umbracoCoreDebugSettings.description: Typed configuration options for core debug settings.

LogIncompletedScopes.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether incompleted scopes should be logged.

DumpOnTimeoutThreadAbort.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether memory dumps on thread abort should be taken.

umbracoExceptionFilterSettings.description: Typed configuration options for exception filter settings.

Disabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the exception filter is disabled.

umbracoModelsBuilderSettings.description: Typed configuration options for models builder settings.

ModelsMode.description: Gets or sets a value for the models mode.

ModelsNamespace.description: Gets or sets a value for models namespace.

FlagOutOfDateModels.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether we should flag out-of-date models.

ModelsDirectory.description: Gets or sets a value for the models directory.

AcceptUnsafeModelsDirectory.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to accept an unsafe value for ModelsDirectory.

DebugLevel.description: Gets or sets a value indicating the debug log level.

umbracoGlobalSettings.description: Typed configuration options for global settings.

ReservedUrls.description: Gets or sets a value for the reserved URLs.

ReservedPaths.description: Gets or sets a value for the reserved paths.

TimeOut.description: Gets or sets a value for the timeout

DefaultUILanguage.description: Gets or sets a value for the default UI language.

HideTopLevelNodeFromPath.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to hide the top level node from the path.

UseHttps.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether HTTPS should be used.

VersionCheckPeriod.description: Gets or sets a value for the version check period in days.

UmbracoPath.description: Gets or sets a value for the Umbraco back-office path.

IconsPath.description: Gets or sets a value for the Umbraco icons path.

UmbracoCssPath.description: Gets or sets a value for the Umbraco CSS path.

UmbracoScriptsPath.description: Gets or sets a value for the Umbraco scripts path.

UmbracoMediaPath.description: Gets or sets a value for the Umbraco media path.

InstallMissingDatabase.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to install the database when it is missing.

DisableElectionForSingleServer.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to disable the election for a single server.

DatabaseFactoryServerVersion.description: Gets or sets a value for the database factory server version.

MainDomLock.description: Gets or sets a value for the main dom lock.

NoNodesViewPath.description: Gets or sets a value for the path to the no content view.

DatabaseServerRegistrar.description: Gets or sets a value for the database server registrar settings.

DatabaseServerMessenger.description: Gets or sets a value for the database server messenger settings.

Smtp.description: Gets or sets a value for the SMTP settings.

IsSmtpServerConfigured.description: Gets a value indicating whether SMTP is configured.

SqlWriteLockTimeOut.description: An int value representing the time in milliseconds to lock the database for a write operation

umbracoDatabaseServerRegistrarSettings.description: Typed configuration options for database server registrar settings.

WaitTimeBetweenCalls.description: Gets or sets a value for the amount of time to wait between calls to the database on the background thread.

StaleServerTimeout.description: Gets or sets a value for the time span to wait before considering a server stale, after it has last been accessed.

umbracoDatabaseServerMessengerSettings.description: Typed configuration options for database server messaging settings.

MaxProcessingInstructionCount.description: Gets or sets a value for the maximum number of instructions that can be processed at startup; otherwise the server cold-boots (rebuilds its caches).

TimeToRetainInstructions.description: Gets or sets a value for the time to keep instructions in the database; records older than this number will be pruned.

TimeBetweenSyncOperations.description: Gets or sets a value for the time to wait between each sync operations.

TimeBetweenPruneOperations.description: Gets or sets a value for the time to wait between each prune operations.

allOf.description: Typed configuration options for SMTP settings.

From.description: Gets or sets a value for the SMTP from address to use for messages.

Host.description: Gets or sets a value for the SMTP host.

Port.description: Gets or sets a value for the SMTP port.

SecureSocketOptions.description: Gets or sets a value for the secure socket options.

PickupDirectoryLocation.description: Gets or sets a value for the SMTP pick-up directory.

DeliveryMethod.description: Gets or sets a value for the SMTP delivery method.

Username.description: Gets or sets a value for the SMTP user name.

Password.description: Gets or sets a value for the SMTP password.

umbracoSecureSocketOptions.description:
Matches MailKit.Security.SecureSocketOptions and defined locally to avoid having to take
a dependency on this external library into Umbraco.Core.

umbracoHealthChecksSettings.description: Typed configuration options for healthchecks settings.

DisabledChecks.description: Gets or sets a value for the collection of healthchecks that are disabled.

Notification.description: Gets or sets a value for the healthcheck notification settings.

umbracoDisabledHealthCheckSettings.description: Typed configuration options for disabled healthcheck settings.

Id.description: Gets or sets a value for the healthcheck Id to disable.

DisabledOn.description: Gets or sets a value for the date the healthcheck was disabled.

DisabledBy.description: Gets or sets a value for Id of the user that disabled the healthcheck.

umbracoHealthChecksNotificationSettings.description: Typed configuration options for healthcheck notification settings.

Enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether health check notifications are enabled.

FirstRunTime.description: Gets or sets a value for the first run time of a healthcheck notification in crontab format.

Period.description: Gets or sets a value for the period of the healthcheck notification.

NotificationMethods.description: Gets or sets a value for the collection of health check notification methods.

DisabledChecks.description: Gets or sets a value for the collection of health checks that are disabled for notifications.

umbracoHealthChecksNotificationMethodSet.description: Typed configuration options for healthcheck notification method settings.

Enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the health check notification method is enabled.

Verbosity.description: Gets or sets a value for the health check notifications reporting verbosity.

FailureOnly.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the health check notifications should occur on failures only.

Settings.description: Gets or sets a value providing provider specific settings for the health check notification method.

umbracoHostingSettings.description: Typed configuration options for hosting settings.

ApplicationVirtualPath.description: Gets or sets a value for the application virtual path.

LocalTempStorageLocation.description: Gets or sets a value for the location of temporary files.

Debug.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether umbraco is running in [debug mode].

umbracoImagingSettings.description: Typed configuration options for imaging settings.

Cache.description: Gets or sets a value for imaging cache settings.

Resize.description: Gets or sets a value for imaging resize settings.

umbracoImagingCacheSettings.description: Typed configuration options for image cache settings.

BrowserMaxAge.description: Gets or sets a value for the browser image cache maximum age.

CacheMaxAge.description: Gets or sets a value for the image cache maximum age.

CachedNameLength.description: Gets or sets a value for length of the cached name.

CacheFolder.description: Gets or sets a value for the cache folder.

umbracoImagingResizeSettings.description: Typed configuration options for image resize settings.

MaxWidth.description: Gets or sets a value for the maximim resize width.

MaxHeight.description: Gets or sets a value for the maximim resize height.

umbracoIndexCreatorSettings.description: Typed configuration options for index creator settings.

LuceneDirectoryFactory.description: Gets or sets a value for lucene directory factory type.

umbracoKeepAliveSettings.description: Typed configuration options for keep alive settings.

DisableKeepAliveTask.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the keep alive task is disabled.

KeepAlivePingUrl.description: Gets a value for the keep alive ping URL.

umbracoLoggingSettings.description: Typed configuration options for logging settings.

MaxLogAge.description: Gets or sets a value for the maximum age of a log file.

umbracoMemberPasswordConfigurationSettin.description: Typed configuration options for member password settings.

RequiredLength.description: Gets a value for the minimum required length for the password.

RequireNonLetterOrDigit.description: Gets a value indicating whether at least one non-letter or digit is required for the password.

RequireDigit.description: Gets a value indicating whether at least one digit is required for the password.

RequireLowercase.description: Gets a value indicating whether at least one lower-case character is required for the password.

RequireUppercase.description: Gets a value indicating whether at least one upper-case character is required for the password.

HashAlgorithmType.description: Gets a value for the password hash algorithm type.

MaxFailedAccessAttemptsBeforeLockout.description: Gets a value for the maximum failed access attempts before lockout.

umbracoNuCacheSettings.description: Typed configuration options for NuCache settings.

BTreeBlockSize.description: Gets or sets a value defining the BTree block size.

umbracoRequestHandlerSettings.description: Typed configuration options for request handler settings.

AddTrailingSlash.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to add a trailing slash to URLs.

ConvertUrlsToAscii.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to convert URLs to ASCII (valid values: "true", "try" or "false").

ShouldConvertUrlsToAscii.description: Gets a value indicating whether URLs should be converted to ASCII.

ShouldTryConvertUrlsToAscii.description: Gets a value indicating whether URLs should be tried to be converted to ASCII.

CharCollection.description: Gets or sets a value for the default character collection for replacements.

umbracoRuntimeSettings.description: Typed configuration options for runtime settings.

MaxQueryStringLength.description: Gets or sets a value for the maximum query string length.

MaxRequestLength.description: Gets or sets a value for the maximum request length.

umbracoSecuritySettings.description: Typed configuration options for security settings.

KeepUserLoggedIn.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to keep the user logged in.

HideDisabledUsersInBackOffice.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to hide disabled users in the back-office.

AllowPasswordReset.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow user password reset.

AuthCookieName.description: Gets or sets a value for the authorization cookie name.

AuthCookieDomain.description: Gets or sets a value for the authorization cookie domain.

UsernameIsEmail.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user's email address is to be considered as their username.

UserPassword.description: Gets or sets a value for the user password settings.

MemberPassword.description: Gets or sets a value for the member password settings.

umbracoUserPasswordConfigurationSettings.description: Typed configuration options for user password settings.

RequiredLength.description: Gets a value for the minimum required length for the password.

RequireNonLetterOrDigit.description: Gets a value indicating whether at least one non-letter or digit is required for the password.

RequireDigit.description: Gets a value indicating whether at least one digit is required for the password.

RequireLowercase.description: Gets a value indicating whether at least one lower-case character is required for the password.

RequireUppercase.description: Gets a value indicating whether at least one upper-case character is required for the password.

HashAlgorithmType.description: Gets a value for the password hash algorithm type.

MaxFailedAccessAttemptsBeforeLockout.description: Gets a value for the maximum failed access attempts before lockout.

umbracoTourSettings.description: Typed configuration options for tour settings.

EnableTours.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether back-office tours are enabled.

umbracoTypeFinderSettings.description: Typed configuration options for type finder settings.

AssembliesAcceptingLoadExceptions.description: Gets or sets a value for the assemblies that accept load exceptions during type finder operations.

umbracoWebRoutingSettings.description: Typed configuration options for web routing settings.

TryMatchingEndpointsForAllPages.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to check if any routed endpoints match a front-end request before
the Umbraco dynamic router tries to map the request to an Umbraco content item.

TrySkipIisCustomErrors.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether IIS custom errors should be skipped.

InternalRedirectPreservesTemplate.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an internal redirect should preserve the template.

DisableAlternativeTemplates.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the use of alternative templates are disabled.

ValidateAlternativeTemplates.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the use of alternative templates should be validated.

DisableFindContentByIdPath.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether find content ID by path is disabled.

DisableRedirectUrlTracking.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether redirect URL tracking is disabled.

UrlProviderMode.description: Gets or sets a value for the URL provider mode (UrlMode).

UmbracoApplicationUrl.description: Gets or sets a value for the Umbraco application URL.

umbracoUrlMode.description: Specifies the type of URLs that the URL provider should produce, Auto is the default.

umbracoUmbracoPluginSettings.description: Typed configuration options for the plugins.

BrowsableFileExtensions.description: Gets or sets the allowed file extensions (including the period ".") that should be accessible from the browser.

umbracoUnattendedSettings.description: Typed configuration options for unattended settings.

InstallUnattended.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether unattended installs are enabled.

UpgradeUnattended.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether unattended upgrades are enabled.

UnattendedUserName.description: Gets or sets a value to use for creating a user with a name for Unattended Installs

UnattendedUserEmail.description: Gets or sets a value to use for creating a user with an email for Unattended Installs

UnattendedUserPassword.description: Gets or sets a value to use for creating a user with a password for Unattended Installs

CacheBuster.description: The cache buster type to use

umbracoFormsDefinition.description: Configurations for the Umbraco Forms package to Umbraco CMS

umbracoDeployDefinition.description: Configurations for the Umbraco Deploy package to Umbraco CMS
